```{r table-species-gain-global, results = 'asis'}
drake::loadd(significant_gain_global, significant_gain_site, sites)

glance_table(significant_gain_global) %>%
  dplyr::select(recipient, estimate, statistic, p.value) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(recipient = paste0('{\\emph{ ', recipient, '}}')) %>%
  dplyr::rename(`p value` = p.value,
         `difference` = estimate,
         `plant species` = recipient) %>%
  knitr::kable(
    caption = "Results of testing the alternative hypothesis that the conspecific pollen density in open flowers is greater than the density in bagged flowers. Tests were performed at the species level (across communities).", 
    escape = FALSE, 
    booktabs = TRUE, 
    linesep = c("")) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(font_size = 8)
```

```{r table-species-gain-site, results = 'asis'}
drake::loadd(significant_gain_global, significant_gain_site, sites)
table_frame <- glance_table(significant_gain_site) %>%
 dplyr::inner_join(sites, by = "site_name") %>%
  dplyr::group_by(recipient) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(n_sites = dplyr::n_distinct(site_name)) %>%
  dplyr::filter(n_sites > 1) %>%
  dplyr::group_by() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(site_name = paste(locality_name, land_use, fragment, sep = ' - '),
         recipient = paste0('{\\emph{ ', recipient, '}}')) %>%
  dplyr::select(recipient, site_name, estimate, statistic, p.value) %>%
  dplyr::rename(`p value` = p.value,
         `difference` = estimate,
         `plant species` = recipient, 
         `community` = site_name)

seps <-dplyr::if_else(table_frame$`plant species` == 
  dplyr::lag(table_frame$`plant species`), "", "\\addlinespace") %>%
  na.omit()

table_frame %>%
  knitr::kable(
    caption = "Results of testing the alternative hypothesis that the conspecific pollen density in open flowers is greater than the density in bagged flowers. Tests were performed at the community level. Only species present in more than one community are shown.", 
    escape = FALSE, 
    booktabs = TRUE, 
    linesep = seps, 
    digits = 3) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(font_size = 8)
```

```{r table-aic-random-models, results= 'asis'}
drake::loadd(glanced_random, random_effects)

summ <- glanced_random %>%
  dplyr::filter(var_trans == "log", 
                scale == "community") %>%
  dplyr::group_by(pollen_category, scale, var_trans, model) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(delta_AIC = AIC - min(AIC)) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(pollen_category, scale, var_trans, random_effect) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(AIC_50 = median(delta_AIC), 
            AIC_05 = quantile(delta_AIC, 0.05),
            AIC_95 = quantile(delta_AIC, 0.95), 
            n = n()) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by() %>%
  dplyr::select(-var_trans) %>%
  dplyr::right_join(expand.grid(pollen_category = unique(.$pollen_category),
                        scale = unique(.$scale),
                        random_effect = unique(.$random_effect))) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate_if(is.numeric, round, digits = 1) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(delta_AIC = paste0(AIC_50, " [", AIC_05, ", ", AIC_95, "]"), 
         delta_AIC = dplyr::if_else(grepl("NA", delta_AIC), "---", delta_AIC)) %>%
  dplyr::group_by() %>%
  humanize(random_effects = random_effects) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(pollen_category, random_name, scale) %>%
  dplyr::rename(`pollen type` = pollen_category, 
         `random structure` = random_name) 

summ %>%
  dplyr::select(`pollen type`, `random structure`, delta_AIC) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption = paste('Comparison of the different random structures we considered. The table shows median delta AIC values of', dplyr::n_distinct(glanced_random$model), "bootsrap resamples of the data. The 5th and 95th percentile are shown inside square brackets. Communities are defined by individual fragments but ignore the hierarchical arrangement of sampling sites."),
               booktabs = TRUE) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(font_size = 8) %>%
  kableExtra::column_spec(column = 1, bold=T) %>%
  kableExtra::collapse_rows(columns = 1, latex_hline = "major", valign = "middle")
```

```{r table-aic-fixed-models, results= 'asis'}
drake::loadd(model_formula_ranking)

model_formula_ranking$by_model_set %>% 
  dplyr::filter(scale == "community") %>%
  dplyr::mutate(delta_AIC = paste0(round(delta_AIC, 1), 
                                  " [", 
                                  round(delta_AIC_quantile_05, 1),
                                  " ,", 
                                  round(delta_AIC_quantile_95, 1),
                                  "]")) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by() %>%
  humanize(formula_long = TRUE) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(fixed_formula = paste("~", fixed_formula)) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(pollen_category, delta_AIC_rank) %>%
  dplyr::select(pollen_category, fixed_formula, delta_AIC) %>%
  dplyr::rename(`pollen type` = pollen_category, 
                `fixed structure` = fixed_formula) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption = paste('Comparison of the different fixed structures we considered. The table shows median delta AIC values of', dplyr::n_distinct(glanced_random$model), "bootsrap resamples of the data. The 5th and 95th percentile are shown inside square brackets."),
               booktabs = TRUE) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(font_size = 8) %>%
  kableExtra::column_spec(column = 1, bold=T) %>%
  kableExtra::collapse_rows(columns = 1, latex_hline = "major", valign = "middle")
```
